LanguageData.CrystalMechanoids_Description: Allows creation of mechanoid-only caravans and adds color synchronization between mechanoids and buildings.
LanguageData.CM_EnableColorSyncDesc: Buildings will automatically match mechanoid colors when this is enabled.
LanguageData.CM_ToggleColorSyncDesc: Toggle whether this building syncs its color with mechanoids
LanguageData.CM_SyncBuildingColorsDesc: When enabled, crystal buildings will automatically change colors to match your mechanoids.
